ground_truth: As she runs up to the Lorings' front door, she smoothes down the hem of the skirt she wears over her jeans and peers in through one of the two oval leaded windows. She shows Mark the image. Mark seems to lose himself in the music, then he looks at Juno. Juno notices a VHS. He snatches the tape from her, and they watch the film where a sinister man drives a stake through a woman's stomach. Juno shows Vanessa the picture, and Vanessa studies the image lengthwise and sideways, then looks across at Mark, who shrugs brutally. Vanessa stands with her arms tightly folded. He places Juno's bag over her shoulder and opens the door to let her out. Vanessa gives her husband a tight smile. It's dark by the time Juno arrives home, sipping from a drinks carton. Bren is cutting out pictures of dogs, and as Bren goes back to her paper dogs, Juno pours the dregs of her drink into Bren's ornament. Outside, on the snowy street, Juno stops the Previa and eases off her grey overskirt. Bleeker's mother opens her front door, and Juno races up the stairs, outrunning Bleeker's mother and getting to Bleeker's room before her. Bleeker reaches for a box. Juno eases herself into a chair with her legs apart and slides onto the floor next to him. They both look away awkwardly, and Juno suddenly looks glum. At her home, Vanessa, in an old T-shirt with her hair pulled back in a ponytail, stands before a bare wall. Mark, standing next to her with his arms folded, looks glum. Playing nervously with the chain around her neck, Vanessa turns to the wall behind her, and Mark stares bleakly at the wall. Juno and Leah are in the mall, crouching down behind a glass balcony. Vanessa is joking around with a friend's little girl in the mall play area. Leah sucks in her cheeks, stands up, and looks elsewhere, but Juno stays where she is, gazing down at Vanessa playing with the little girl, and a soft smile spreads across her face. They walk into Vanessa, who shakes her head in awe. Juno winces and then plants Vanessa's hand on her belly. Vanessa shakes her head, and her beautiful sculpted face tightens self-consciously. Then, she drops to her knees in front of Juno, and with a nervous glance about her, she places her hands on Juno's belly. Her eyes widen excitedly, and Juno, standing over her, watches her with a mixture of fondness and pride as Vanessa gazes at the swollen belly like a love-struck puppy. Bren, at the sewing machine, cuts the top of a pair of jeans and sews on an elasticated band, giving a satisfied smile as she tests the elastic.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: As she approaches the Lorings' front door, she smoothes her skirt over her jeans and peers through an oval leaded window. She shows Mark an image, and he loses himself in the music before looking at Juno. Juno notices a VHS, and they watch a film where a sinister man drives a stake through a woman's stomach. Juno shows Vanessa the picture, and Vanessa examines it, then looks at Mark, who shrugs. Vanessa stands with folded arms. He places Juno's bag over her shoulder and opens the door for her. Vanessa gives her husband a tight smile. It's dark when Juno arrives home, sipping from a drink carton. Bren is cutting out pictures of dogs, and Juno pours her drink's dregs into Bren's ornament. Outside, Juno stops the Previa and removes her grey overskirt. Bleeker's mother opens her door, and Juno races upstairs, reaching Bleeker's room first. Bleeker reaches for a box, and Juno slides onto the floor next to him. They look away awkwardly, and Juno suddenly looks glum. At home, Vanessa, in an old T-shirt with her hair in a ponytail, stands before a bare wall. Mark, next to her with folded arms, looks glum. Vanessa nervously plays with her necklace and turns to the wall, while Mark stares bleakly. Juno and Leah are in the mall, crouching behind a glass balcony. Vanessa jokes with a friend's little girl in the play area. Leah stands up and looks elsewhere, but Juno stays, smiling softly at Vanessa. They walk to Vanessa, who shakes her head in awe. Juno winces and places Vanessa's hand on her belly. Vanessa's face tightens self-consciously, then she kneels and places her hands on Juno's belly, eyes widening excitedly. Juno watches with fondness and pride as Vanessa gazes at her belly like a love-struck puppy. Bren, at the sewing machine, cuts jeans and sews on an elastic band, smiling as she tests it.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: Juno smoothes her skirt over jeans and peers through the Lorings' window. She shows Mark an image, and he loses himself in music before noticing a VHS. He grabs the tape, and they watch a sinister film. Juno shows Vanessa the picture; Vanessa studies it and looks at Mark, who shrugs. Vanessa stands with folded arms. Mark places Juno's bag on her shoulder and opens the door. Vanessa gives a tight smile. Juno arrives home in the dark, sipping a drink. Bren cuts out dog pictures, and Juno pours her drink's dregs into Bren's ornament. Outside, Juno removes her overskirt. At Bleeker's, she races upstairs, reaching his room first. They sit awkwardly, and Juno looks glum. At home, Vanessa, in an old T-shirt, stands before a bare wall with Mark, both looking glum. Vanessa nervously plays with her necklace. At the mall, Juno and Leah crouch behind a balcony, watching Vanessa play with a child. Juno smiles softly. They approach Vanessa, who shakes her head. Juno places Vanessa's hand on her belly. Vanessa kneels, excitedly touching Juno's belly, while Juno watches with fondness. Bren sews an elastic band onto jeans, smiling as she tests it.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description: As she hurriedly runs up to the Lorings' front door, she takes a moment to smooth down the hem of the skirt she is wearing over her jeans. She then peers in through one of the two oval leaded windows, trying to catch a glimpse inside. She proceeds to show Mark the image she has brought. Mark seems to become completely absorbed in the music, losing himself in its rhythm, before he turns his attention back to Juno. Juno's eyes catch sight of a VHS tape. He quickly snatches the tape from her grasp, and together they watch the film, which features a sinister man driving a stake through a woman's stomach. Juno then shows Vanessa the picture, and Vanessa examines the image both lengthwise and sideways, scrutinizing it carefully before glancing across at Mark, who responds with a brutal shrug. Vanessa stands there with her arms tightly folded across her chest. He places Juno's bag over her shoulder and opens the door to let her out. Vanessa gives her husband a tight, restrained smile. By the time Juno arrives home, it is already dark outside, and she is sipping from a drinks carton. Bren is busy cutting out pictures of dogs, and as Bren returns to her paper dogs, Juno pours the remaining dregs of her drink into one of Bren's ornaments. Outside, on the snowy street, Juno stops the Previa and carefully eases off her grey overskirt. Bleeker's mother opens her front door, and Juno races up the stairs, managing to outrun Bleeker's mother and reaching Bleeker's room before she does. Bleeker reaches for a box, and Juno eases herself into a chair, sitting with her legs apart before sliding onto the floor next to him. They both look away awkwardly, and Juno suddenly appears glum. At her own home, Vanessa, dressed in an old T-shirt with her hair pulled back in a ponytail, stands before a bare wall. Mark, standing next to her with his arms folded, also looks glum. Playing nervously with the chain around her neck, Vanessa turns to face the wall behind her, while Mark stares bleakly at the same wall. Juno and Leah are at the mall, crouching down behind a glass balcony. Vanessa is joking around with a friend's little girl in the mall's play area. Leah sucks in her cheeks, stands up, and looks elsewhere, but Juno remains where she is, gazing down at Vanessa as she plays with the little girl, and a soft smile gradually spreads across her face. They walk over to Vanessa, who shakes her head in awe. Juno winces slightly and then places Vanessa's hand on her belly. Vanessa shakes her head, and her beautifully sculpted face tightens with self-consciousness. Then, she drops to her knees in front of Juno, and with a nervous glance around her, she places her hands on Juno's belly. Her eyes widen with excitement, and Juno, standing over her, watches her with a mixture of fondness and pride as Vanessa gazes at the swollen belly like a love-struck puppy. Meanwhile, Bren, at the sewing machine, cuts the top off a pair of jeans and sews on an elasticated band, giving a satisfied smile as she tests the elasticity of her handiwork.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description: As she hurriedly makes her way up to the elegant front door of the Lorings' residence, she pauses for a brief moment to ensure that the hem of the skirt she has thoughtfully chosen to wear over her jeans is smoothed down properly. She then leans closer to one of the two beautifully crafted oval leaded windows, hoping to get a sneak peek inside. Afterward, she proceeds to show Mark the image she has brought with her. Mark appears to become completely engrossed and utterly absorbed in the music, allowing himself to lose touch with reality as he immerses in its captivating rhythm, before he eventually turns his full attention back to Juno. Juno's eyes happen to catch sight of a VHS tape lying nearby. In a swift motion, he snatches the tape from her grasp, and together, they proceed to watch the film. The movie features a sinister man menacingly driving a stake through a woman's stomach. Juno then shares the picture with Vanessa, who examines the image meticulously, both lengthwise and sideways, scrutinizing it with care before casting a glance toward Mark, who responds with an indifferent and brutal shrug. Vanessa stands there with her arms tightly folded across her chest, exuding a sense of composure. He places Juno's bag over her shoulder and respectfully opens the door to let her out. Vanessa offers her husband a tight, restrained smile, reflecting her mixed emotions. By the time Juno arrives back at her home, it is already dark outside, and she is casually sipping from a drinks carton. Bren is occupied with the meticulous task of cutting out pictures of various dogs, and as Bren returns her focus to her paper dogs, Juno casually pours the remaining dregs of her drink into one of Bren's ornamental pieces. Outside, on the snowy street, Juno brings the Previa to a stop and carefully eases off her grey overskirt. Bleeker's mother opens the front door to her home, and Juno races swiftly up the stairs, managing to outrun Bleeker's mother and reaching Bleeker's room before she can catch up. Bleeker reaches over for a box, while Juno eases herself into a chair, sitting with her legs apart before gradually sliding onto the floor next to him. They both avert their gazes awkwardly, and Juno suddenly appears to be glum. At her own home, Vanessa, dressed in an old, comfortable T-shirt with her hair neatly pulled back in a ponytail, stands in front of a bare wall, contemplating it. Mark, standing beside her with his arms sternly folded, also looks glum. Nervously playing with the chain around her neck, Vanessa turns to face the wall behind her for a change of perspective, while Mark continues to stare bleakly at the same wall. Meanwhile, Juno and Leah are at the bustling mall, crouched down behind a glass balcony. Vanessa is playfully joking around with a friend's little girl in the lively play area of the mall. Leah sucks in her cheeks thoughtfully, stands up, and looks elsewhere, but Juno remains where she is, gazing down at Vanessa as she engages playfully with the little girl, a soft smile gradually spreading across her face. They walk over to Vanessa, who shakes her head in awe at the moment. Juno winces slightly and then gently places Vanessa's hand on her belly. Vanessa shakes her head again, her beautifully sculpted face tightening with a hint of self-consciousness. Then, she drops to her knees in front of Juno, and with a nervous glance around her surroundings, she places her hands tenderly on Juno's belly. Her eyes widen with excitement as she feels the life within, and Juno, standing elegantly over her, watches her with a mixture of fondness and pride, observing Vanessa as she gazes at the swollen belly like a love-struck puppy. Meanwhile, Bren, seated at the sewing machine, carefully cuts the top off a pair of jeans and skillfully sews on an elasticated band, giving a satisfied smile as she tests the elasticity of her handiwork with precision and care.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: As she approaches the Lorings' front door with a quickened pace, she takes a moment to smooth down the hem of the skirt she wears over her jeans, ensuring it sits just right, before leaning in to peer through one of the two oval leaded windows, trying to catch a glimpse of the interior. She then presents an image to Mark, who, after a moment of being absorbed in the music, shifts his focus to Juno. Juno's attention is caught by a VHS tape, and Mark swiftly snatches it from her grasp. Together, they watch the film, captivated by the scene where a sinister man drives a stake through a woman's stomach. Juno then shows the picture to Vanessa, who examines it thoroughly, turning it lengthwise and sideways, before casting a glance at Mark, who responds with a dismissive shrug. Vanessa stands there, her arms tightly folded across her chest, exuding a sense of tension. Mark then gently places Juno's bag over her shoulder and opens the door, allowing her to step out. Vanessa offers her husband a tight, restrained smile. By the time Juno arrives home, darkness has fallen, and she sips from a drinks carton as she enters. Inside, Bren is busy cutting out pictures of dogs, and as she returns to her paper dogs, Juno casually pours the remnants of her drink into one of Bren's ornaments. Outside, on the snowy street, Juno brings the Previa to a stop and carefully eases off her grey overskirt. As Bleeker's mother opens her front door, Juno races up the stairs with urgency, managing to outrun Bleeker's mother and reach Bleeker's room ahead of her. Bleeker reaches for a box, and Juno eases herself into a chair, spreading her legs apart before sliding onto the floor next to him. They both avert their gazes awkwardly, and Juno's expression suddenly turns glum. Meanwhile, at her home, Vanessa stands before a bare wall, dressed in an old T-shirt with her hair pulled back in a ponytail, while Mark stands beside her with his arms folded, looking equally glum. Vanessa nervously fiddles with the chain around her neck, then turns to face the wall behind her, as Mark stares bleakly at it. In the mall, Juno and Leah crouch down behind a glass balcony, observing the scene below. Vanessa is in the play area, joking around with a friend's little girl. Leah sucks in her cheeks, stands up, and looks elsewhere, but Juno remains where she is, watching Vanessa play with the little girl, and a soft smile gradually spreads across her face. They approach Vanessa, who shakes her head in awe. Juno winces slightly before taking Vanessa's hand and placing it on her belly. Vanessa shakes her head, her beautifully sculpted face tightening with self-consciousness. Then, she drops to her knees in front of Juno, and with a nervous glance around, she places her hands on Juno's belly. Her eyes widen with excitement, and Juno, standing over her, observes with a blend of fondness and pride as Vanessa gazes at the swollen belly like a love-struck puppy. Meanwhile, Bren, seated at the sewing machine, carefully cuts the top of a pair of jeans and sews on an elasticated band, giving a satisfied smile as she tests the elasticity of her handiwork.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description:
As Juno approaches the Lorings' front door, she adjusts her skirt over her jeans and peers through the oval leaded windows. She shares an image with Mark, who momentarily loses himself in the music before noticing Juno's interest in a VHS tape. They watch a film together, featuring a sinister scene, before Juno shows the picture to Vanessa. Vanessa examines it thoughtfully, then exchanges a tense glance with Mark. Vanessa stands with her arms folded as Mark helps Juno with her bag and opens the door for her departure, offering Vanessa a tight smile. 

By the time Juno arrives home, it's dark, and she sips from a drink carton while Bren cuts out pictures of dogs. Juno pours the remnants of her drink into Bren's ornament before heading outside. On the snowy street, she stops the Previa and removes her grey overskirt. At Bleeker's house, Juno races up the stairs, reaching Bleeker's room ahead of his mother. As Bleeker retrieves a box, Juno settles into a chair and then slides to the floor beside him, both feeling awkward. 

Meanwhile, at her home, Vanessa stands in an old T-shirt with her hair in a ponytail, facing a bare wall with Mark beside her, both looking glum. Vanessa nervously plays with her necklace as Mark stares at the wall. Later, at the mall, Juno and Leah crouch behind a glass balcony, watching Vanessa play with a friend's little girl. Leah eventually stands and looks away, but Juno remains, smiling softly at the scene. They approach Vanessa, who shakes her head in awe. Juno winces but places Vanessa's hand on her belly. Vanessa, self-conscious, drops to her knees and places her hands on Juno's belly, her eyes widening with excitement. Juno watches with fondness and pride as Vanessa gazes at her belly with adoration.

Back at home, Bren works at the sewing machine, altering a pair of jeans by adding an elasticated band, smiling with satisfaction as she tests the elastic.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: As she runs up to the Lorings' front door, she smoothes down the hem of the skirt she wears over her jeans, a fashion trend that gained popularity in the late 2000s for its quirky style, and peers in through one of the two oval leaded windows crafted by a local artisan known for her intricate glasswork. She shows Mark the image, a recent ultrasound picture that reveals the baby's profile. Mark seems to lose himself in the music, a melancholy tune from the 90s, then he looks at Juno. Juno notices a VHS, a relic of a time before streaming services became ubiquitous. He snatches the tape from her, and they watch the film where a sinister man drives a stake through a woman's stomach, a classic horror scene reminiscent of vintage slasher films. Juno shows Vanessa the picture, and Vanessa studies the image lengthwise and sideways, then looks across at Mark, who shrugs brutally, as though the weight of impending responsibilities is beginning to settle on his shoulders. Vanessa stands with her arms tightly folded, a posture that indicates her indecision and anxiety. He places Juno's bag over her shoulder and opens the door to let her out. Vanessa gives her husband a tight smile that conceals the tension beneath her calm exterior. It's dark by the time Juno arrives home in her suburban neighborhood, sipping from a drinks carton branded with her favorite organic juice. Bren, an avid scrapbooker, is cutting out pictures of dogs, and as Bren goes back to her paper dogs, Juno pours the dregs of her drink into Bren's ornament, a quirky vase shaped like a dog. Outside, on the snowy street, Juno stops the Previa, a popular minivan model during the 1990s, and eases off her grey overskirt. Bleeker's mother, known for her warm hospitality, opens her front door, and Juno races up the stairs, outrunning Bleeker's mother and getting to Bleeker's room before her. Bleeker reaches for a box, which contains an eclectic collection of vintage vinyl records. Juno eases herself into a chair with her legs apart and slides onto the floor next to him. They both look away awkwardly, and Juno suddenly looks glum as she contemplates the changes ahead. At her home, Vanessa, in an old T-shirt with her hair pulled back in a ponytail, stands before a bare wall where a nursery is soon to be decorated. Mark, standing next to her with his arms folded, looks glum, reflecting the reality of impending parenthood. Playing nervously with the chain around her neck, Vanessa turns to the wall behind her, a blank canvas for the life they are about to bring into their home, and Mark stares bleakly at the wall. Juno and Leah, known for their mischievous antics, are in the mall, crouching down behind a glass balcony. Vanessa is joking around with a friend's little girl in the mall play area, which is filled with brightly colored climbing frames. Leah sucks in her cheeks, stands up, and looks elsewhere, but Juno stays where she is, gazing down at Vanessa playing with the little girl, and a soft smile spreads across her face as she envisions Vanessa as the nurturing mother she hopes she will be. They walk into Vanessa, who shakes her head in awe, overwhelmed by the moment. Juno winces and then plants Vanessa's hand on her belly, feeling the flutter of a kick under her palm. Vanessa shakes her head, and her beautiful sculpted face tightens self-consciously. Then, she drops to her knees in front of Juno, and with a nervous glance about her, she places her hands on Juno's belly. Her eyes widen excitedly, and Juno, standing over her, watches her with a mixture of fondness and pride as Vanessa gazes at the swollen belly like a love-struck puppy, imagining the life soon to join theirs. Bren, at the sewing machine, cuts the top of a pair of jeans and sews on an elasticated band, a practical alteration for Juno's expanding waistline, giving a satisfied smile as she tests the elastic.

test_cases.name: Addition (~50%)
test_cases.description: As she runs up to the Lorings' front door she smoothes down the hem of the skirt she wears over her jeans and peers in through one of the two oval leaded windows. She shows Mark the image. Mark seems to lose himself in the music. then he looks at Juno. Juno notices a VHS. He snatches the tape from her and they watch the film where a sinister man drives a stake through a woman's stomach. Juno shows Vanessa the picture and Vanessa studies the image lengthwise and sideways then looks across at Mark who shrugs brutally. Vanessa stands with her arms tightly folded. He places Juno's bag over her shoulder and opens the door to let her out. Vanessa gives her husband a tight smile. It is dark by the time Juno arrives home sipping from a drinks carton. Bren is cutting out pictures of dogs and as Bren goes back to her paper dogs Juno pours the dregs of her drink into Bren's ornament. Outside on the snowy street Juno stops the Previa and eases off her grey overskirt. Bleeker's mother opens her front door and Juno races up the stairs outrunning Bleeker's mother and getting to Bleeker's room before her. Bleeker reaches for a box. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. Juno eases herself into a chair with her legs apart and slides onto the floor next to him. They both look away awkwardly and Juno suddenly looks glum. At her home Vanessa in an old Tshirt with her hair pulled back in a ponytail stands before a bare wall. Mark standing next to her with his arms folded looks glum. Playing nervously with the chain around her neck. Vanessa turns to the wall behind her and Mark stares bleakly at the wall. Juno and Leah are in the mall crouching down behind a glass balcony. Vanessa is joking around with a friend's little girl in the mall play area. Leah sucks in her cheeks stands up and looks elsewhere but Juno stays where she is gazing down at. Vanessa playing with the little girl and a soft smile spreads across her face. They walk into Vanessa who shakes her head in awe. Juno winces and then plants Vanessa's hand on her belly. Vanessa shakes her head and her beautiful sculpted face tightens selfconsciously. Then she drops to her knees in front of Juno and with a nervous glance about her she places her hands on Juno's belly. Her eyes widen excitedly and Juno standing over her watches her with a mixture of fondness and pride as Vanessa gazes at the swollen belly like a lovestruck puppy. Bren at the sewing machine cuts the top of a pair of jeans and sews on an elasticated band giving a satisfied smile as she tests the elastic.

test_cases.name: Subject Corruption
test_cases.description: As the cat runs up to the Lorings' front door, it smoothes down the hem of the skirt it wears over its jeans and peers in through one of the two oval leaded windows. The dog shows Mark the image. Mark seems to lose himself in the music, then he looks at the bird. The bird notices a VHS. It snatches the tape from the dog, and they watch the film where a sinister man drives a stake through a woman's stomach. The bird shows Vanessa the picture, and the parrot studies the image lengthwise and sideways, then looks across at Mark, who shrugs brutally. The rabbit stands with its arms tightly folded. The elephant places the bird's bag over its shoulder and opens the door to let it out. The snake gives its husband a tight smile. It's dark by the time the fish arrives home, sipping from a drinks carton. The whale is cutting out pictures of dogs, and as the whale goes back to its paper dogs, the horse pours the dregs of its drink into the whale's ornament. Outside, on the snowy street, the zebra stops the Previa and eases off its grey overskirt. The bear's mother opens her front door, and the kangaroo races up the stairs, outrunning the bear's mother and getting to the bear's room before her. The giraffe reaches for a box. The monkey eases itself into a chair with its legs apart and slides onto the floor next to the giraffe. They both look away awkwardly, and the donkey suddenly looks glum. At its home, the penguin, in an old T-shirt with its hair pulled back in a ponytail, stands before a bare wall. The gorilla, standing next to it with its arms folded, looks glum. Playing nervously with the chain around its neck, the panda turns to the wall behind it, and the gorilla stares bleakly at the wall. The owl and the fox are in the mall, crouching down behind a glass balcony. The kangaroo is joking around with a friend's little girl in the mall play area. The dog sucks in its cheeks, stands up, and looks elsewhere, but the owl stays where it is, gazing down at the kangaroo playing with the little girl, and a soft smile spreads across its face. They walk into the coyote, who shakes its head in awe. The lizard winces and then plants the coyote's hand on its belly. The coyote shakes its head, and its beautiful sculpted face tightens self-consciously. Then, it drops to its knees in front of the lizard, and with a nervous glance about it, it places its hands on the lizard's belly. Its eyes widen excitedly, and the lizard, standing over it, watches it with a mixture of fondness and pride as the coyote gazes at the swollen belly like a love-struck puppy. The walrus, at the sewing machine, cuts the top of a pair of jeans and sews on an elasticated band, giving a satisfied smile as it tests the elastic.

test_cases.name: Object Corruption
test_cases.description: As she runs up to the Lorings' back gate, she smoothes down the cuff of the blouse she wears over her shorts and peers in through one of the two rectangular stained-glass windows. She shows Mark the portrait. Mark seems to lose himself in the painting, then he looks at Juno. Juno notices a vinyl record. He snatches the disc from her, and they listen to the album where a sinister man drives a hammer through a woman's chest. Juno shows Vanessa the drawing, and Vanessa studies the sketch lengthwise and sideways, then looks across at Mark, who shrugs fiercely. Vanessa stands with her arms tightly crossed. He places Juno's umbrella over her shoulder and opens the gate to let her out. Vanessa gives her husband a tight frown. It's dim by the time Juno arrives home, sipping from a juice bottle. Bren is cutting out pictures of cats, and as Bren goes back to her paper cats, Juno pours the dregs of her drink into Bren's plant pot. Outside, on the icy street, Juno stops the Vespa and eases off her blue jacket. Bleeker's mother opens her garden gate, and Juno races up the path, outrunning Bleeker's mother and getting to Bleeker's treehouse before her. Bleeker reaches for a crate. Juno eases herself into a beanbag with her legs apart and slides onto the ground next to him. They both look away awkwardly, and Juno suddenly looks melancholy. At her home, Vanessa, in an old sweatshirt with her hair pulled back in a braid, stands before a plain window. Mark, standing next to her with his arms crossed, looks dejected. Playing nervously with the ring around her finger, Vanessa turns to the window behind her, and Mark stares bleakly at the window. Juno and Leah are in the arcade, crouching down behind a stone bench. Vanessa is joking around with a friend's little boy in the arcade play area. Leah sucks in her cheeks, stands up, and looks elsewhere, but Juno stays where she is, gazing down at Vanessa playing with the little boy, and a soft smile spreads across her face. They walk into Vanessa, who shakes her head in amazement. Juno winces and then plants Vanessa's hand on her arm. Vanessa shakes her head, and her beautiful sculpted face tightens self-consciously. Then, she drops to her knees in front of Juno, and with a nervous glance about her, she places her hands on Juno's arm. Her eyes widen excitedly, and Juno, standing over her, watches her with a mixture of fondness and pride as Vanessa gazes at the swollen arm like a love-struck kitten. Bren, at the workbench, cuts the top of a pair of trousers and sews on an elasticated band, giving a satisfied smile as she tests the elastic.

test_cases.name: Action Corruption
test_cases.description: As she skips up to the Lorings' front door, she fluffs the collar of the skirt she wears over her jeans and glances in through one of the two oval leaded windows. She hands Mark the image. Mark appears to sink into the music, then he gestures toward Juno. Juno observes a VHS. He grabs the tape from her, and they examine the film where a sinister man throws a stake through a woman's stomach. Juno hands Vanessa the picture, and Vanessa inspects the image lengthwise and sideways, then glances across at Mark, who shrugs dismissively. Vanessa stands with her arms subtly flexed. He hangs Juno's bag over her shoulder and closes the door to let her out. Vanessa offers her husband a tight smile. It's dark by the time Juno arrives home, sipping from a drinks carton. Bren is sketching pictures of dogs, and as Bren returns to her paper dogs, Juno empties the dregs of her drink into Bren's ornament. Outside, on the snowy street, Juno parks the Previa and removes her grey overskirt. Bleeker's mother opens her front door, and Juno dashes up the stairs, racing Bleeker's mother and reaching Bleeker's room before her. Bleeker pulls out a box. Juno lowers herself into a chair with her legs apart and settles onto the floor next to him. They both avert their eyes awkwardly, and Juno suddenly appears downcast. At her home, Vanessa, in an old T-shirt with her hair pulled back in a ponytail, stands before a bare wall. Mark, standing next to her with his arms folded, appears downcast. Fidgeting with the chain around her neck, Vanessa turns to the wall behind her, and Mark gazes bleakly at the wall. Juno and Leah are in the mall, crouching down behind a glass balcony. Vanessa is fooling around with a friend's little girl in the mall play area. Leah puffs out her cheeks, stands up, and looks elsewhere, but Juno remains where she is, gazing down at Vanessa playing with the little girl, and a soft smile creeps across her face. They walk into Vanessa, who shakes her head in admiration. Juno flinches and then places Vanessa's hand on her belly. Vanessa shakes her head, and her beautiful sculpted face contorts self-consciously. Then, she kneels in front of Juno, and with a nervous glance around her, she rests her hands on Juno's belly. Her eyes widen with excitement, and Juno, standing over her, watches her with a mixture of fondness and pride as Vanessa gazes at the swollen belly like a love-struck puppy. Bren, at the sewing machine, trims the top of a pair of jeans and stitches on an elasticated band, giving a satisfied smile as she stretches the elastic.

test_cases.name: Subject-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: As the sandwich zips up to the bicycle's garage door, it smoothes down the hem of the curtain it wears over its shoes and peers in through one of the two rectangular plastic windows. It shows the lamp the painting. The lamp seems to lose itself in the laughter, then it looks at the notebook. The notebook notices a CD. It snatches the disc from it, and they watch the animation where a cheerful child drives a pencil through a balloon's string. The notebook shows the television the photograph, and the television studies the painting upside down and diagonally, then looks across at the lamp, who shrugs gently. The television stands with its arms tightly crossed. It places the notebook's hat over its head and opens the window to let it out. The television gives its sibling a wide grin. It's bright by the time the notebook arrives at the beach, sipping from a juice box. The book is cutting out images of cats, and as the book goes back to its paper cats, the notebook pours the remnants of its drink into the book's vase. Inside, on the sandy path, the notebook stops the bicycle and eases off its blue cape. The blanket's father opens his bedroom window, and the notebook races up the ladder, outrunning the blanket's father and getting to the blanket's drawer before it. The blanket reaches for a jar. The notebook eases itself into a hammock with its legs apart and slides onto the mat next to it. They both look away awkwardly, and the notebook suddenly looks cheerful. At its cave, the television, in an old jacket with its hair pulled back in a bun, stands before a painted bookshelf. The lamp, standing next to it with its arms folded, looks cheerful. Playing nervously with the key around its wrist, the television turns to the bookshelf behind it, and the lamp stares brightly at the bookshelf. The notebook and the computer are in the field, crouching down behind a wooden fence. The television is joking around with a neighbor's young boy in the field play area. The computer sucks in its breath, stands up, and looks elsewhere, but the notebook stays where it is, gazing down at the television playing with the young boy, and a broad smile spreads across its face. They walk into the television, who shakes its head in disbelief. The notebook giggles and then plants the television's hand on its knee. The television shakes its head, and its beautiful sculpted face tightens excitedly. Then, it drops to its knees in front of the notebook, and with a nervous glance about it, it places its hands on the notebook's knee. Its eyes widen dreamily, and the notebook, standing over it, watches it with a mixture of fondness and pride as the television gazes at the swollen knee like a love-struck kitten. The book, at the painting easel, cuts the top of a pair of socks and sews on an elasticated ribbon, giving a satisfied smile as it tests the elastic.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action Corruption
test_cases.description: As the rabbit springs up to the Lorings' front door, it pats down the rim of the scarf it wears over its jeans and squints in through one of the two oval leaded windows. It flashes Rhonda the picture. Rhonda seems to lose herself in the dance, then she glances at Hugo. Hugo detects a VHS. She lifts the tape from him, and they view the painting where a joyful clown juggles a pineapple through another clown's chest. Hugo displays the photograph to Fiona, and Fiona examines the image horizontally and vertically, then glances across at Rhonda, who shrugs wildly. Fiona perches with her elbows sharply bent. She drops Hugo's hat over his shoulder and shuts the gate to let him in. Fiona sends her sister a vague grin. It's bright by the time Hugo strolls home, munching from a candy wrapper. Abel is sketching rabbits, and as Abel returns to his sketches, Hugo dribbles the remnants of his candy into Abel's vase. Outside, on the bustling avenue, Hugo parks the bicycle and pulls off his red scarf. Orion's aunt opens her garage door, and Hugo sprints up the stairs, overtaking Orion's aunt and reaching Orion's room before her. Orion reaches for a pencil case. Hugo slides onto a stool with his legs crossed and settles onto the carpet next to him. They both look away hastily, and Hugo suddenly appears thoughtful. At her cottage, Fiona, in an old jumpsuit with her hair tied in a bun, stands before a decorated wall. Rhonda, leaning next to her with her arms loose, appears thoughtful. Fiddling cautiously with the ribbon around her neck, Fiona turns to the picture behind her, and Rhonda observes blankly at the picture. Hugo and Nellie are in the park, ducking down behind a wooden bench. Fiona is laughing with a cousin's young child in the park swing set. Nellie exhales and stretches up, turning away, but Hugo remains in place, staring down at Fiona laughing with the young child, and a gentle grin spreads across his face. They stroll into Fiona, who nods in wonder. Hugo grimaces and then places Fiona's hand on his shoulder. Fiona nods, and her pretty carved features stiffen awkwardly. Then, she sits on her heels in front of Hugo, and with a curious glance around, she sets her hands on Hugo's shoulder. Her eyes broaden delightedly, and Hugo, leaning over her, surveys her with a blend of warmth and esteem as Fiona admires the decorated shoulder like a mesmerized kitten. Abel, at the pottery wheel, slices the cuff of a jacket and attaches a sequined patch, giving a content nod as he tests the patch.

test_cases.name: Object-Action Corruption
test_cases.description: As she slides up to the Lorings' front porch, she adjusts the cuff of the blazer she wears over her leggings and squints in through one of the two square frosted panels. She presents Mark the illustration. Mark seems to drift away in the silence, then he glances at Juno. Juno observes a cassette. He grabs the disc from her, and they view the animation where a mysterious figure launches a dart through a woman's shoulder. Juno displays the artwork to Vanessa, and Vanessa examines the illustration upside down and in reverse, then glances over at Mark, who shrugs carelessly. Vanessa stands with her arms loosely hanging. He places Juno's hat over her head and closes the window to usher her out. Vanessa gives her husband a wide grin. It's dusk by the time Juno reaches home, munching from a snack pouch. Bren is arranging clippings of cats, and as Bren returns to her paper cats, Juno empties the remnants of her snack into Bren's vase. Outside, on the frosty avenue, Juno halts the Vespa and slips off her blue cardigan. Bleeker's mother unlocks her back gate, and Juno dashes up the ladder, overtaking Bleeker's mother and reaching Bleeker's attic before her. Bleeker grasps for a package. Juno slides onto a stool with her arms folded and lowers herself onto the carpet next to him. They both turn aside awkwardly, and Juno suddenly seems pensive. At her home, Vanessa, in a frayed blouse with her hair twisted up in a bun, stands before a decorated wall. Mark, standing next to her with his hands open, looks pensive. Fidgeting nervously with the ring around her finger, Vanessa turns to the mural behind her, and Mark gazes blankly at the surface. Juno and Leah are in the plaza, leaning down behind a steel railing. Vanessa is jesting with a neighbor's tiny boy in the plaza sandbox. Leah puckers her lips, stands up, and stares away, but Juno stays where she is, observing Vanessa engaging with the tiny boy, and a broad smile emerges across her face. They stroll into Vanessa, who nods in amazement. Juno grimaces and then places Vanessa's palm on her knee. Vanessa nods, and her radiant refined face constricts self-consciously. Then, she kneels in front of Juno, and with a cautious glance around, she places her palms on Juno's knee. Her eyes open wide excitedly, and Juno, standing over her, observes her with a blend of amusement and admiration as Vanessa gazes at the bent knee like an entranced squirrel. Bren, at the knitting machine, trims the bottom of a shirt and stitches on a fringed border, giving a pleased grin as she examines the fringe.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: As he cycles up to the Thompson's garage, he straightens the strap of the hat he wears over his overalls and squints in through one of the three square stained glass panels. He displays Julia the sketch. Julia seems to lose herself in the painting, then she glances at Rina. Rina spots a DVD. She grabs the disc from him, and they view the animation where a cheerful lad plants a seed in a giant cat's paw. Rina presents Oliver the diagram, and Oliver inspects the sketch diagonally and upside down, then peers over at Julia, who grimaces playfully. Oliver stands with his hands loosely clasped. She places Rina's scarf over his neck and pulls the gate to let him in. Oliver flashes his wife a wide grin. It's misty by the time Rina reaches the park, munching from a snack pouch. Cal is cutting out shapes of cats, and as Cal returns to her paper cats, Rina spills the last of her snack into Cal's vase. Inside, on the damp path, Rina halts the bicycle and pulls off her orange raincoat. Dylan's father unlocks his garage, and Rina races through the garden, outpacing Dylan's father and sliding to Dylan's shed before him. Dylan grabs for a basket. Rina lowers herself onto a bench with her feet together and shifts onto the rug beside her. They both glance aside shyly, and Rina suddenly appears grumpy. At her garden, Oliver, in a vintage hoodie with his hair tied back in a bun, stands before a cluttered fence. Julia, standing next to him with her hands on hips, looks grumpy. Twirling nervously with the bracelet around his wrist, Oliver turns to the fence beside him, and Julia gazes blankly at the fence. Rina and Sam are in the park, lying down behind a wooden bench. Oliver is joking around with a cousin's young boy in the school play area. Sam puffs out her lips, sits down, and faces sideways, but Rina remains where she is, staring down at Oliver playing with the young boy, and a wide grin covers her face. They stroll up to Oliver, who tilts his head in disbelief. Rina shudders and then presses Oliver's foot on her lap. Oliver tilts his head, and his rugged worn-out face tightens bashfully. Then, he collapses to his elbows in front of Rina, and with a cautious peek around him, he places his feet on Rina's knees. His face brightens eagerly, and Rina, looming over him, observes him with a mix of warmth and satisfaction as Oliver gazes at the growing lap like an amused kitten. Cal, at the easel, trims the hem of a shirt and sews on a decorative patch, giving a contented grin as she tests the patch.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: Juno hurries to the Lorings' door, adjusts her skirt, and peers inside. She and Mark get absorbed in a disturbing VHS tape. Juno shows Vanessa a picture, leading to an awkward exchange. Mark escorts Juno out, and Vanessa forces a smile. After returning home, Juno pours out her drink and removes her overskirt. She rushes to Bleeker's room, sitting beside him awkwardly, feeling suddenly glum. At Vanessa's, she and Mark stand silently, both looking somber. Later, at the mall, Juno watches Vanessa play with a friend's child, smiling softly. She and Leah greet Vanessa, who reacts emotionally when Juno places her hand on her belly. Vanessa drops to her knees, excitedly touching Juno’s belly as Juno observes with pride. Meanwhile, Bren alters a pair of jeans with an elastic band, pleased with her work.

test_cases.name: Reverse Segments Order
test_cases.description: Bren at the sewing machine cuts the top of a pair of jeans and sews on an elasticated band giving a satisfied smile as she tests the elastic Her eyes widen excitedly and Juno standing over her watches her with a mixture of fondness and pride as Vanessa gazes at the swollen belly like a lovestruck puppy  Then she drops to her knees in front of Juno and with a nervous glance about her she places her hands on Juno's belly  Vanessa shakes her head and her beautiful sculpted face tightens selfconsciously  Juno winces and then plants Vanessa's hand on her belly  They walk into Vanessa who shakes her head in awe  Vanessa playing with the little girl and a soft smile spreads across her face  Leah sucks in her cheeks stands up and looks elsewhere but Juno stays where she is gazing down at  Vanessa is joking around with a friend's little girl in the mall play area  Juno and Leah are in the mall crouching down behind a glass balcony  Vanessa turns to the wall behind her and Mark stares bleakly at the wall  Playing nervously with the chain around her neck  Mark standing next to her with his arms folded looks glum  At her home Vanessa in an old Tshirt with her hair pulled back in a ponytail stands before a bare wall  They both look away awkwardly and Juno suddenly looks glum  Juno eases herself into a chair with her legs apart and slides onto the floor next to him  Bleeker reaches for a box  Bleeker's mother opens her front door and Juno races up the stairs outrunning Bleeker's mother and getting to Bleeker's room before her  Outside on the snowy street Juno stops the Previa and eases off her grey overskirt  Bren is cutting out pictures of dogs and as Bren goes back to her paper dogs Juno pours the dregs of her drink into Bren's ornament  It's dark by the time Juno arrives home sipping from a drinks carton  Vanessa gives her husband a tight smile  He places Juno's bag over her shoulder and opens the door to let her out  Vanessa stands with her arms tightly folded  Juno shows Vanessa the picture and Vanessa studies the image lengthwise and sideways then looks across at Mark who shrugs brutally  He snatches the tape from her and they watch the film where a sinister man drives a stake through a woman's stomach  Juno notices a VHS  Mark seems to lose himself in the music then he looks at Juno  She shows Mark the image  As she runs up to the Lorings' front door she smoothes down the hem of the skirt she wears over her jeans and peers in through one of the two oval leaded windows
